description:
Contents:

- "Relunea Bottoms" Hunter layered armor piece

These clean-looking bottoms may give you some nostaglic flashbacks to your school days.

Hunt in style with this special layered armor!

- Hunter Layered Armor can be used in the Layered Armor Settings menu of the Item Box.
- This item can be equipped to your hunterâ€™s legs.
- Layered armor is a "skin" which changes the appearance of the character without affecting their stats and abilities.
name: "Relunea Bottoms" Hunter layered armor piece
